author: Special Correspondent
text:
In Karaikal, Nagapattinam and Tiruvarur

: The Tiruchi Railway Division will conduct the second phase of safety awareness campaign by displaying posters and exhibiting video films in a railway coach which would be kept at Karaikal on March 28, Nagapattinam (March 29), Tiruvarur (March 30), Villupuram (April 1), Tiruvannamalai (April 4), Vellore (April 5) and Vriddhachalam (April 7). The coach would be open for public viewing from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Entry is free, a Southern Railway press release here said.
title: Railway safety campaign
